title._content: [Unidentified young soldier in kepi and vest] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified young soldier in kepi and vest] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 7.4 x 6.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather ornate cross design. Photograph shows book, probably a bible, in vest pocket. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Youth--1860-1870. Books--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27173 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2320
